parsifalreset-legend: Press submit to clear the Parsifal cache and log file, clear the page and parser caches and remove several other Dante log files and the sidebar cache file of DanteTree
parsifalformat: Parsifal: Format page for TeX, Print, PDF
parsifal-desc: An extension enabling LaTeX and other high-quality media processing in Mediawiki
action-resetParsifal: clean up intermediate files of the Parsifal subsystem
